text:
If you like me already know - or got to know Mary from #Splott in recent days (!) - this is wonderful to see. 

Thankyou @CV_UHB - great to see the #Covid19 #Vaccine being ramped up.

And thanks to wonderful @MoorlandSTAR who do so much to support Mary + her friends.

#BeLikeMary https://t.co/QXdwHqoT5h
